entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default parameters of interface type are silently set to null for string constants #59789
    17.2

Closed

  • Can't debug EditorFeatures layer #59673
    Backlog
  • GTD: Better name for project containing files retrieved via Source Link #59138
    17.2
  • `NotNullIfNotNullAttribute` doesn't work for nullable value-typed parameters #59764
  • Visual Studio 17.1 brown error messages when Source Generator triggered while generated files are open #59633
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add GlobalOptions.SetBackgroundAnalysisScope and PythiaGlobalOptions External Access API #59794
    Area-IDE
  • Removed navigation target and navigation hint from namespaces #59793
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Disable Auto-Open behavior for Stack Trace Explorer (#59785) #59791
    Area-IDE
  • Workspace config options #59790
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Improve PDB source document project handling #59643
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Disable Auto-Open behavior for Stack Trace Explorer #59785
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make the IDocumentNavigationSerivice entirely async. #59784
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • AnalyzeDataFlow: Added missing handling for delegate construction from extension method #59745
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed odd naming suggestions #59674
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary accesses on XML end tag #59771
    Area-Compilers
  • Add OmniSharpCompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync #59782
    Area-IDE
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
